title: Gifted my Friend RP but he not reciving it even after clicking the notification
body:
Gifted my Friend RP but he not reciving it even after clicking the notification
My username is Mistress Nymph
his is godlike666

replies.body: Is your friend still having this issue? I took a look at their account and everything looks to be in order, but if they're still having issues they can reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our specialists will be happy to reach back out. ^.^
